page.title: 15School Dinners
page.content: Ten past twelve,oh no school dins! Cannonball peas solid as rocks, Knife breaking burgers that make your jaw lock, Bloody beef thats not cooked, Thats what we've got. Please sir can I have a bucket, I think I am going to be sick, I've just seen seconds, The custard's lumpy and thick, It's enough to make any one sick, The sight of the cabbage, Sitting there on the plate, I think tommorrow I'm going to be late, Really it's the excitment I hate, Just standing there is frightening, While they dump it on the plate.
